title: Tesla sticks by Model 3 target, posts record loss
text:
Tesla sticks by Model 3 target, posts record loss Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:49 
Tesla said on Wednesday it was sticking with Chief Executive Elon Musk’s revised production targets for its Model 3 electric sedan, but posted its worst-ever quarterly loss, and warned that spending would increase slightly this year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Tesla said on Wednesday it was sticking with Chief Executive Elon Musk’s revised production targets for its Model 3 electric sedan, but posted its worst-ever quarterly loss, and warned that spending would increase slightly this year.
